timeline.bodyText: disable -> disabled. But we have only one example of system prop about disabling: nuxeo.vcs.fulltext.disabled and nuxeo.vcs.fulltext.search.disabled. So it would be better to inverse the logic and use an enabled prop, as we have tons of those.
timeline.author: efge

wdyt?
